text: wadhkur -'ayaha alrasula- lihula' almushrikin ma hrmmana ealaa alyhwd min albahayim waltayra: wahu klu ma lm yakun mashquq al'asabie kal'iibl walnnaeam, washuhum albaqar walghanmi, 'iilaa ma ealiq min alshahm bizuhuriha 'aw 'ameayiha, 'aw akhtalat bieazm alalyt waljanab wanahw dhalik. dhlk altaharum almadhkur ealaa alyhwd euqubatan minna lahum bsbb 'aemalahum alsayiyata, w'inna lasadiqun fima 'akhbarana bih eanhama
